column5: I have been invited to go fish in Dunville this is for some family bass derby. My cousin has asked me to go he pays we use my boat. So I'm all in but I have never fished down there so i have no clue about the area. I'm not sure I will be able to get down to fish before the derby. any pointers
cover water... look for marinas with docks if ur fishing the river for bass. they are tough to come by in there but theres some around.
yeaahhhhh... gotta watch for those DICKS at the marina..
Your going to the wrong place if your expecting to catch bass. I would reconsider your options or change your target species to carp, catfish or pickerel.
well it is supose to be a bass derby mind you the picture on flyer shower a pike so i'm not really sure at all. I'm going to fish for fishing
Run to the lake, find some rock piles and throw some jerk baits & spinner baits.
Lots of places on the Grand to fish for bass like around Cayuga and Caledonia but Ive never heard of Dunnville being a good spot unless you do like Court said and run to the lake.

YOU Novice!If you only knew! Just gotta be there at the right moment! THEIR THERE!Go find em! Sorry thats what a bud use to say to me!A local that put me onto the fish! And pickerel as well, where you wouldnt think of trying. Not gonna tell either!except that its not far from fishmasters,Thats all!
